Activity: Check emails and address urgent requests related to the EHR modifications.
Review yesterday's progress and plan for today's tasks.

Review all the tasks completed this week. Ensure that all the pending tasks are well scheduled for the next week.
Finalize the weekly report on the EHR modification project. Enjoy the weekend.
